title: minerjones
author: minerjones
content: LOT 1: Ballet PURE Signature Set*Not pictured, but will come with the display box as seen in the product pageSTARTING BID: 0.0130BTCLOT 2: Casascius paper key "1CSY9Zqu" ICG GenuineSTARTING BID: 0.0002BTCLOT 3: 5x Alpen Coin Custom 2021 D.I.Y. Kit*Each Alpen Coin will come with instruction card, hologram and COA*Lot 3 will work on a LIFO system as seen in previous multi-chip/coin auctionsSTARTING BID: 0.0004BTCLOT 1LOT 2LOT 3STARTING BID PER LOT: SEE ABOVEMINIMUM BID INCREMENT PER LOT/PER COIN: 0.0001BTC**Please limit bids to ONLY 4 decimal places**END TIME: FEBRUARY 13th, 2023, 14:00:00 PDT**Payment due within 24 hours of auction end!!**SNIPE: Any bid made in last 5 minutes PER LOT will extend the auction 5 minutes beyond the ending time PER LOT.If within those 5 extended minutes, a new bid is made, 5 minutes will be added to the auction from the time of that bid PER LOT.PAYMENT: Bitcoin BTC. A signed PGP message will be sent to winner with payment addressSHIPPING: Based on location and preference

comments.author: krogothmanhattan
comments.body: That is interesting...was never aware they graded Mike's paper wallets from his coins!   Nice artifacts indeed...I only wish they someday get to grade my coins and have Jumbo slabs to fit them in

comments.author: minerjones
comments.body: Quote from: montreal1 on February 08, 2023, 05:57:23 PMlot 1: 0.0130 BTCQuote from: bitbollo on February 08, 2023, 11:02:18 PMlot 2 0.0008Quote from: DirtyBirdE on February 08, 2023, 06:22:50 PMLot 3 - 5 @ .0005Current high bidsQuote from: krogothmanhattan on February 08, 2023, 08:14:51 PM  That is interesting...was never aware they graded Mike's paper wallets from his coins!   Nice artifacts indeed...I only wish they someday get to grade my coins and have Jumbo slabs to fit them in  Not sure if I was the first one to do, but had asked ICG to see if they could do as a favor.. and indeed, they were able to slab them as "Genuine" with no grade.

comments.author: OgNasty
comments.body: Quote from: krogothmanhattan on February 08, 2023, 08:14:51 PM  That is interesting...was never aware they graded Mike's paper wallets from his coins!   Nice artifacts indeed...I only wish they someday get to grade my coins and have Jumbo slabs to fit them in  I agree. This is the first time I’ve seen a paper wallet from Casascius that has been graded, or even being offered for sale in any form. Makes you realize just how special those coins are. I’ve never peeled one so it’s always interesting to see what’s under the hologram.

comments.author: Mbitr
comments.body: Lot 2 - 0.0012BTCPleaseYep - definitely a funny little oddity
